data.message: Sorry for speaking my mind...that young man saved me,Marshall Bruce Mathers III (EMINEM),,sorry they broke me again,im in love with my sebian friend Johnny Simic...no holliwood,im no star i fucking sleep with weapons under bed all maround house im not crazy just so sick of being me i like to please people,i'm a doctor now,ukraian princess,faqggot loving nigga loving fat dumb cunt...jimmus gone,i killed him,well i tried many times so fucking what thought fuck i was nea good ebough,bullied ny even my family,who cares how many times ive been raped stood over,fuck off i am me
